abstract: French Parliament approves bill to penalize those who pay prostitutes for sex, ending debate that has gone on for over two years.

headline.print_headline: To Discourage Prostitution, France Passes Bill That Penalizes Clients
headline.main: To Discourage Prostitution, France Passes Bill That Penalizes Clients

snippet: First-time offenders will pay a fine of about $1,700 if they “solicit, accept or obtain relations of a sexual nature.” The fine can rise to about $4,300 for repeat offenders.
lead_paragraph: First-time offenders will pay a fine of about $1,700 if they “solicit, accept or obtain relations of a sexual nature.” The fine can rise to about $4,300 for repeat offenders.
